column4: i cant get sb live usb's surround to work on ubuntu, so sadly im going back to windows, at least for my sound tasks :(
i just want bloody 5 speakers to work thats all :(
i dont know why that is so hard to implement in linux
I invite you to go ahead and do it and submit your work upstream, we will greatly appreciate it
you might be able to write one with wget and awk and grep and sed
umm, can u explain more plz?

hmmm, well you wget the page with weather information, you inspect the source to figure out how it situates things, and then you manipulate it with grep awk and sed so that it will get you whatever you want. like temperature or something like that, what did you want it to say
alright because I am bored I will take a stab at it, find a webpage that has the information you want on it
and give me the link obviously
cat WV1 | grep obsTempText | sed -e 's|>||g' -e 's|\&.*||g' | awk -FB '{print $2}'
ok here it is, this will find the temperature: wget -q http://uk.weather.com/weather/local/WV1 -O- | grep obsTempText | sed -e 's|>||g' -e 's|\&.*||g' | awk -FB '{print $2}'
